reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: Providing food assistance to the most vulnerable in Marsabit County, Kenya

description.narrative: - Effective contribution to alleviating the suffering of living life and the difficulty of obtaining food for poor families and the most needy in the current crisis and the critical conditions that the country and the world are going through from the Corona pandemic. -Contribute to providing aid and assistance to (7899) families consisting of (47,334) individuals.

Providing food assistance to the most needy and poor groups in the Marspet district of Kenya, which is facing severe levels of food insecurity, stage IV (IPC4) as a result of the current conditions and the Corona pandemic, by securing (7899) food baskets.

participating-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
